* This class defines the "DukeException" type Exception
* method to create a new DukeException object
* @param message the message of the exception
* This class defines the "Event" type Task
* method to create a new Event object
* @param description the name of the Event
* @param time the time of the Event
public Event(String description, String time) throws DukeException//project meeting /at Mon 2-4pm
throw new DukeException("Please enter in the following syntax: event (EventName) /at YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM");

* This class defines the "Todo" type Task
* method to create a new Todo object
* @param description the description of the Todo
public Todo(String description) throws DukeException       //todo is only a string. no need date and time
if(description.trim().isEmpty())            //if description is juz white spaces.
